entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.5
entry.content:
Changes

  • Fixed cloudflareRealIP middleware wasn't set to be recursive by default
  • Improved error message for route conflicts

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.6
entry.content:
Changes

  • Improved error message on route alias conflict (89d93dd8780bad6262ff955f11efddbb070724d4)
  • Removed some redundant debug logging (22a12d31164e7e1f2cdff5f2ace9d9c9e5cc68f1)

Fixes

  • Proxmox LXC idlesleep feature (27409abc246d36be3c9721a4e88075e92a80dbc3)
  • OIDC: token refresh not working when receiving multiple requests at a time from the same session (c5fd21552eb96af4358358f2f992e2993780adc1)

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.7
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Access logger: unable to rotate log file due to error: os: invalid use of WriteAt on file opened with O_APPEND
  • Idle sleep: docker containers not sleeping after idle for a period of time

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.8
entry.content:
Changes

  • security: dropped unnecessary privilege and turned GoDoxy into rootless. Please replace the old one with the docker compose below.
  • including small code changes
  • docs: Wiki update
  • Reorganized
  • Looks more elegant and easier to navigate
  • Now available on the WebUI
  • GitHub Wiki moved to https://docs.godoxy.dev

New Docker Compose

```yaml

services: socket-proxy: container_name: socket-proxy image: lscr.io/linuxserver/socket-proxy:latest environment: - ALLOW_START=1 - ALLOW_STOP=1 - ALLOW_RESTARTS=1 - CONTAINERS=1 - EVENTS=1 - INFO=1 - PING=1 - POST=1 - VERSION=1 volumes: - ${DOCKER_SOCKET:-/var/run/docker.sock}:/var/run/docker.sock restart: unless-stopped tmpfs: - /run ports: - ${SOCKET_PROXY_LISTEN_ADDR:-127.0.0.1:2375}:2375 labels: proxy.exclude: true frontend: image: ghcr.io/yusing/godoxy-frontend:${TAG:-latest} container_name: godoxy-frontend restart: unless-stopped network_mode: host # do not change this env_file: .env user: ${GODOXY_UID:-1000}:${GODOXY_GID:-1000} read_only: true security_opt: - no-new-privileges:true cap_drop: - all depends_on: - app environment: HOSTNAME: 127.0.0.1 PORT: ${GODOXY_FRONTEND_PORT:-3000} labels: proxy.aliases: ${GODOXY_FRONTEND_ALIASES:-godoxy} proxy.#1.port: ${GODOXY_FRONTEND_PORT:-3000} app: image: ghcr.io/yusing/godoxy:${TAG:-latest} container_name: godoxy restart: always network_mode: host # do not change this env_file: .env user: ${GODOXY_UID:-1000}:${GODOXY_GID:-1000} depends_on: socket-proxy: condition: service_started security_opt: - no-new-privileges:true cap_drop: - all cap_add: - NET_BIND_SERVICE environment: - DOCKER_HOST=tcp://${SOCKET_PROXY_LISTEN_ADDR:-127.0.0.1:2375} volumes: - ./config:/app/config - ./logs:/app/logs - ./error_pages:/app/error_pages:ro - ./data:/app/data

  # To use autocert, certs will be stored in "./certs".
  # You can also use a docker volume to store it
  - ./certs:/app/certs

  # remove "./certs:/app/certs" and uncomment below to use existing certificate
  # - /path/to/certs/cert.crt:/app/certs/cert.crt
  # - /path/to/certs/priv.key:/app/certs/priv.key

```

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.9
entry.content:
Changes

  • Access Logger
    • remove buffer_size option 16e6e72454b04bb498d670cbb7ac7944077dfd5c
    • buffer size will be adjusted dynamically base on average data rate 16e6e72454b04bb498d670cbb7ac7944077dfd5c
    • added rotation_interval option (default: 1h) 829eb08e376c40fba91e508fb959a229c6c99d5d
    • memory optimization 100d2c392fe6cc66ffd09452beed5b55b5758065

Fixes

  • YAML / JSON handling: panic on zero value 80e59bb481dd07572a6bde66ed92c9da9a0e5e13
  • Access Logger
    • incorrect "original_size" from rotation result 53d54a09b0d5905d11dc1b23c9fd9a758035d80c
    • rotate log file by file size should now work properly
  • Docker
    • Fixed docker retry mechanism 2b4a70a550f17549143bbae7e176f7db728b9281
    • Idlewatcher no longer stop because of error f06741428cddecb70c9afea719e7ea071a1cc69c
